## Pull Request Type

- [ ] Add new resource(s)
- [ ] Fix broken link
- [ ] Update outdated information
- [ ] Fix formatting issue
- [ ] Other (please describe)

---

## Resource Information

**Category Path:**
```
Domain → Category → Subcategory → Topic → Format
Example: 02-SOFTWARE-ENGINEERING/programming-languages/systems-programming/rust/ownership-borrowing/books.md
```

**Resource Title:**


**Format File:**
- [ ] books.md
- [ ] papers.md
- [ ] courses.md
- [ ] videos.md
- [ ] interactive.md
- [ ] documentation.md
- [ ] tools.md
- [ ] podcasts-blogs.md

**Difficulty Section:**
- [ ] BEGINNER
- [ ] INTERMEDIATE
- [ ] ADVANCED
- [ ] CLASSIC
- [ ] RECENT (2023+)

---

## Checklist

### Required

- [ ] I have read CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] I have used the correct template from TEMPLATES/
- [ ] All required fields are filled out
- [ ] The link works and goes directly to the resource
- [ ] I verified this resource is not already listed
- [ ] Category placement is correct per INDEX.md
- [ ] I followed STYLE_GUIDE.md for formatting
- [ ] I followed CITATION-GUIDE.md for citation format

### Quality

- [ ] Author names are complete (no initials unless that's how they publish)
- [ ] Title uses exact official title with correct capitalization
- [ ] Year is publication/update year (not access year)
- [ ] Link includes protocol (https://)
- [ ] Description is one concise sentence
- [ ] "Why included" provides specific justification
- [ ] No marketing language or hyperbole
- [ ] No emojis used

### For Books

- [ ] ISBN included (13-digit preferred)
- [ ] Publisher included
- [ ] Link to official source or legitimate retailer

### For Papers

- [ ] Venue (conference/journal) included
- [ ] DOI or arXiv ID included (if available)
- [ ] Link to PDF or abstract page

### For Multiple Resources

- [ ] Each resource in separate entry
- [ ] Each follows template exactly
- [ ] All in correct difficulty section

---

## For Maintainers

- [ ] Category placement verified
- [ ] Formatting correct
- [ ] No duplicates
- [ ] Link works
- [ ] Quality standards met

**By submitting this pull request, I confirm that:**
1. My contribution follows all guidelines in CONTRIBUTING.md
2. My contributions (metadata, descriptions) are released under CC0 1.0
3. I am not uploading copyrighted content, only references
4. I have verified that links point to legitimate sources
5. I agree to follow CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
